protocol_field.name: ChunkSize
protocol_field.description: A CCNx Message TLV type representing the fixed payload size of user data up to the last chunk. It must be a positive integer.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Specifies the type of the TLV, which is %x000F for ChunkSize.

fields.name: Length
fields.description: The length of the variable-length integer representing the chunk size.
constraints: Must indicate the length of the chunk size field in bytes.

fields.name: ChunkSize
fields.description: The fixed payload size of user data, represented as a variable-length unsigned integer in network byte order. It must be a positive integer.
constraints: Value must be a positive integer.

comments: This JSON structure describes the ChunkSize TLV type used in CCNx chunking.
